entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:42 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 12:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 99.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
